title: The Effect of Teledermatology on Access to Care
details: E Hadeler, K Nouri - Telemedicine and Technological Advances in …, 2024
abstract: The use of teledermatology has rapidly increased during the COVID-19 pandemic. While teledermatology presents promise, concerns over its impact on health care disparitiesfor underserved populations have arisen. In this chapter, we discuss the …
